NationMania.core

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • NationMania.core.Player

  • public final class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Static Class containing all the information needed about the logged user.

      static java.lang.String getUsername() 
      static java.lang.Runnable sendAccountActivatedEmail()
      Called immediately after user sign up.
      In case the user entered email, an activation email is sent to the user.

      Called when the player updates his account.

      Called when the player updates his account.

      Called on the end of a game, if the total score is higher from the player current top score
      Sets player top score
      static java.lang.Runnable updatePlayerFactsHistory(int factID)
      Updates the fact that displayed to the player in the player's facts history list.
      Every fact in this list will not be presented to the player anymore.
      The process is done by a different thread.
      static java.lang.Runnable updatePlayerNationsHistory(int nationID)
      Updates the nation thats played this round in the player's nations history list.
      The process is done by a different thread.

              java.lang.String username,
              java.lang.String email,
              java.lang.String nation,
              int topScore)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        ID - player's unique ID
        username - user name
        email - player's email
        nation - player's home nation
        topScore - player's top score

    • Method Detail

      • getID

        public static int getID()
        Returns:
        player ID

      • getUsername

        public static java.lang.String getUsername()
        Returns:
        player username - the name is uniqe and cannot be replaced

      • setEmail

        public static void setEmail(java.lang.String email)
        Called when the player updates his account. Sets player email.
        Parameters:
        email - the email entered by the player when he edit his account.

      • getEmail

        public static java.lang.String getEmail()
        Returns:
        Player email address. If user did not enter email, the field holds an empty string.

      • getNation

        public static java.lang.String getNation()
        Returns:
        Player home nation

      • setNation

        public static void setNation(java.lang.String nation)
        Called when the player updates his account.
        Sets player home nation
        Parameters:
        nation - the nation the user chose on update account screen

      • getTopScore

        public static int getTopScore()
        Returns:
        Player best score in all games since he registered

      • setTopScore

        public static void setTopScore(int topScore)
        Called on the end of a game, if the total score is higher from the player current top score
        Sets player top score
        Parameters:
        topScore - the score the player achieved during the last game

      • getPlayedFacts

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> getPlayedFacts()
        Returns:
        list containing all the facts the user played in specific recent time. The value of recent time is determined
        in the Configuration file and is set by default to 1 week.
        This is used for improving game experience, by not presenting the user facts he already saw.

      • updatePlayerNationsHistory

        public static java.lang.Runnable updatePlayerNationsHistory(int nationID)
        Updates the nation thats played this round in the player's nations history list.
        The process is done by a different thread.
        Parameters:
        nationID - the ID of the current round nation
        Returns:
        Runnable - use to start new thread via the Executer.

      • updatePlayerFactsHistory

        public static java.lang.Runnable updatePlayerFactsHistory(int factID)
        Updates the fact that displayed to the player in the player's facts history list.
        Every fact in this list will not be presented to the player anymore.
        The process is done by a different thread.
        Parameters:
        factID - the ID of the current displayed fact
        Returns:
        Runnable - use to start new thread via the Executer.

      • sendAccountActivatedEmail

        public static java.lang.Runnable sendAccountActivatedEmail()
        Called immediately after user sign up.
        In case the user entered email, an activation email is sent to the user.
        Returns:
        Runnable - use to start new thread via the Executer.
